versao.sql: ALTER TABLE fDescS_Garagem, DROP COLUMN fDescS_Outro, DROP COLUMN fDescS_Cjto, DROP COLUMN fDescS_Loja;
ALTER TABLE histcomp ADD COLUMN isencao TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NULL;
ALTER TABLE bloco DROP COLUMN fDesc_Apto, DROP COLUMN fDescS_Loja;
ALTER TABLE recibo ADD COLUMN isencao TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NULL;
ALTER TABLE mverba ADD COLUMN dtdesc2 DATE INYINT(1) DEFAULT 0 NULL;
ALTER TABLE lotepagto CHANGE lote lote INT(11) NOT NULL, ADD PRIMARY KEY (lote);
